title: Create DangerZone component with deletion modal
description: Create frontend/src/components/settings/DangerZone.tsx with 'Delete Account' button. Create modal using Radix Dialog with: 1) Warning message about irreversibility, 2) Checklist with 3 items (understand data loss, understand irreversible, understand Instagram disconnect), 3) Text input to type 'DELETE' for confirmation, 4) Final confirmation button (disabled until checklist complete and text matches). Integrate with user.service.deleteAccount(). Redirect to logout page on success.
dod: Section with 'Delete Account' button in red/danger styling
Modal opens with Radix Dialog when button clicked
Modal displays prominent warning about irreversibility
Checklist with 3 checkbox items that must be checked
Text input requiring user to type 'DELETE' (case-insensitive)
Confirmation button disabled until all checkboxes checked and text matches
Loading state during deletion API call
Success toast and redirect to logout/login on success
